A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have a lot of personal feelings and problems with this film that prevent me from giving it higher rating. Many of those include the story\, the way characters are handled and written and how the mythology of Star Wars seems to have been thrown out the window by Rian Johnson. That being said the movie itself is technically fine\, well-acted\, great action\, at times it has some stunning visuals and the score as always is fantastic. A popcorn flick for all ages.
